name: Akamai WAF
description:
Modified one function and added serven commands.
1. Corrected the description for function "list_papi_property_bygroup"
2. Improved the function "list_papi_property_bygroup_ec" to return more context values
3. Improved the command "get_appsec_config_latest_version_command" to return an error if the security configuration with the name provided is not found
4. Added new command "list_papi_property_bygroup_command"
    - Lists properties available for the current contract and group.
5. Added new command "get_papi_property_byname_command"
    - Get papi property info without default rule. To get default rule, please use "get-papi-property-rule" command.
6. Added new command "get_papi_property_byid_command"
    - get papi property info by id without default rule. To get default rule, please use "get-papi-property-rule" command.
7. Added new command "new_papi_proerty_version_command"
    - Create a new property version based on any previous version. All data from the createFromVersion populates the new version, including its rules and hostnames.
8. Added new command "list_papi_proerty_activations_command"
    - This lists all activations for all versions of a property, on both production and staging networks.
9. Added new command "list_appsec_configuration_activation_history_command"
    - Lists the activation history for a configuration. The history is an array in descending order of submitDate. The most recent submitted activation lists first. Products: All.
10. Added new command "list_papi_property_by_hostname_command"
    - Lists active property hostnames for all properties available in an account.
author: David Shen
